item.description:
OSDB is the first competitive dragon boat team in the State of Rhode Island. We train year round; outdoors from the spring to the fall, and indoors during the winter months. We continue to develop a team of enthusiastic and energetic individuals who desire to race competitively in the Northeast.

OSDB welcomes all interested paddlers, ages 18 and up, regardless of experience or ability. For membership information please email us at info@oceanstatedragons.org

OSDB would like to congratulate all of it's members for a great effort in Philadelphia. They competed against 154 teams. OSDB got into the 'A' Division and finished the day at 15th out of 154. If you'd like to see what all the excitment is about come out to one of our practices.
item.name: Ocean State Dragon Boat
